ComicInfo.Title: The Mysterious Continent
ComicInfo.Summary:
Superstar JEFF PARKER (Future Quest) returns to FLASH GORDON, alongside the astounding team of JESSE HAMM & GRACE ALLISON! Flash, Mandrake The Magician & The Phantoms struggle to bring peace to a broken Earthâ€¦but a FAR-too-familiar foe from beyond threatens to destroy everything they hold dear!
